data.name: SOAP Client
data.xml_template:
<route id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}" />
    <setBody>
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setBody>
    {{#if (ne soap_action null)}}
    <setHeader name="SOAPAction">
		<constant>{{soap_action}}</constant>
	</setHeader>
	{{/if}}
    <to uri="cxf://{{endpoint_url}}{{querystring cxf_query_params cxf_extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{#if (eq output_format "json")}}
        {{applyUnmarshal "xml"}}
        <process ref="processorXMLtoJSON"/>
        {{applyUnmarshal "json"}}
    {{/if}}
    {{#if (eq output_format "xml")}}
        {{applyUnmarshal "xml"}}
    {{/if}}    
<multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
